fields.title: 10 best night creams you can use in2018
fields.body:
TOP 10 NIGHT CREAMS YOU CAN USE IN 2018

 

With the innumerous benefits that a night cream can provide your skin, comes the need to choose the right one for your skin type.your night cream will not only help your skin moisturize and hydrate it,but also improve blood circulation and reduce wrinkles.

Here we present the top 10 night creams of 2018:

  1. GARNIER SKINACTIVE ULTRA-LIFT MIRACLE SLEEPING CREAM

This cream contains Lavender Essential Oil,which restores shine and soothes damage; Hyaluronic & Hydroxy Acids, which boosts skin’s natural moisturizing capacity.Applying this cream frequently at night will give you moisturized, wrinkle-free skin.Apply this cream, have a well rested sleep and wake up with flawless skin everyday!

  1. 2. TATCHA LUMINOUS DEWY SKIN NIGHT CONCENTRATE

Good for skin types ranging from sensitive to dry, this cream overcomes problems such as dryness,dullness,uneven texture and wrinkles.Seven rich botanical extracts work to improve your skin.with so many added benefits of the cream itself,the packaging comes with a gold spoon for easy usage.

  1. GOLDFADEN MD PLANT PROFUSION REGENERATIVE NIGHT CREAM

Avoiding the use of parabens, petro-chemicals, mineral oils, alcohol and silicone, This brand is well-known for developing products that combine organic, natural active plant cells and antioxidant-rich botanicals.Among other ingredients, this cream also contains citrus oil, which gives a zesty freshness.

  1. CULT 51 NIGHT CREAM

Cult 51, 51 referring to the 51 claimed benefits it has, is packed with skin-drenching ingredients, oils to lock in that moisture and vitamin C and E to fight fine lines and spots. No other cream is required when you’ve got Cult 51. Its 51 anti-aging benefits are said to give you flawless skin in 28 days!

  1. FABINDIA VITAMIN E NIGHT CREAM

Give yourself a treat before bedtime by using this night cream to moisturize your skin.since its non greasy and it quickly absorbs in your skin,it doesn’t make your skin feel stretchy. This product contains herbal ingredients, which act mildly but are super effective.

  1. AVEENO ABSOLUTELY AGELESs RESTORATIVE NIGHT CREAM

It is clinically proven to help lessen the visible effects of elastin and collagen loss to keep skin looking younger for longer durations.. It is hypoallergenic and non-greasy, so it won’t clog pores.

  1. HIMALAYA HERBALS REVITALIZING NIGHT CREAM

Containing natural elements like Lemon,  Crab Apple, Wheat, White Lily and Tomato, this cream adds health and glow to a dull skin. As it contains Lemon,this cream also has bleaching properties giving you a fairer look.

  1. OLAY NATURAL WHITE HEALTHY FAIRNESS NIGHT CREAM

Combining the effects of both a night cream and a fairness cream, it reduces dark spots and circles and leaves your skin smooth and soft in the morning. Its exclusive triple nutrient formula provides your skin with the much needed vitamins to keep it healthy and glowing.

  1. LAKME FRUIT MOISTURE SKIN RENEWAL NIGHT CREAM

This cream brings freshness to your skin with the help of combined nutrients of strawberry, kiwi and passion fruit.Its added touch is its fruity fragnance. Mostly suitable for dry to normal skin, the cream is of a reputed brand,the packaging is travel friendly.

fields.title: Ten ways to wrap up the ruffled fashion!
fields.body:
Ruffles and frills aren’t new to the fashion world. They have been there since sixties. They have come back in to the trend and ruled almost all the fashion weeks held last spring. Since then, all the stores have restocked the ruffled fashion and this has stolen every woman’s heart.Besides outfits, ruffles have occupied a special place in accessories as well. On screen and off-screen, ruffles have made their own runaway and slayed the style predominantly. The best thing about ruffles is, they suit every body type : zero size to plus size. This is what makes them incredibly flawless.

You all must have flattered Deepika’s fiery look at the recent Cannes festival held a couple of months ago. The stunning hot pink ruffles made her stand out of the crowd at the festival. But , that’s not something we can actually wear on daily basis. Don’t worry! For people who can’t get those ruffles out of their heads ,here are ten ways in which you can actually wear them. Give a glance and kill the style!

1.Ruffle hem wrap dress

One way to wear ruffles is to wrap them around your waist playfully by putting on a ruffle wrap shift dress. Well, in the wrap dresses, you can find too many varieties. Minis to maxis, striped to florals. Any of them would look splendid. High heels add a perfect charisma to the outfit!

2.Ruffled saree

And here is the most aesthetic way to wear ruffles. A saree in ruffle is like the definition of beauty in disguise. Particularly, in the scenic floral prints which promise you the most picturesque and gorgeous look!

3. Tie waist ruffle palazzo pants

Palazzos are the most comfortable bottom wear I can ever imagine. So why can’t we spice up the plain look by adding ruffles to it, incredible right? Ruffle palazzo pants are trendy , comfortable and stylish. They can be worn with blouse, t-shirt, crop top and anything. You can also pair them with body suits to highlight the ruffle details utterly.

4. Ruffle detailed heels

Besides setting themselves at top in the range of outfits, ruffles also did much to the footwear. They have added a feminine tinge to footwear making them bold and beautiful at the same time. They look sharp in solid colors, whereas prints do not disappoint you either. You can wear ruffle flats with your dresses or shorts and ruffle heels look outstanding when paired with skinny jeans and jumpsuits. Wear one to escalate your flair!

5. Ruffle sleeved blouse

This is my favourite way to include ruffles into my outfit. A ruffle sleeved blouse can be paired with anything you want. You can pair it with formal pants for office look, pencil skirts for chic look and skinny jeans for casual look. Do not forget to tuck the blouse in, this way you are balancing the flowy frills.

6.High low ruffle skirt

Skirts are definitely something every wardrobe needs. Moreover, ruffles can’t find a better flowy partner than a skirt. An assymmetrical high low ruffle hemmed skirt would be an amazing pick for any party. Halter and crew necks go well with these skirts. Wear high heels and top knot for more brilliance!

7. Ruffled choker

Chokers can simply complete the whole accessory thing sometimes. Especially when off the shoulder and strapless outfits are worn, chokers play the role of statement accessory and look astounding. Such amazing neck pieces when found in ruffles blow every women’s mind undoubtedtly. This is one of the simplest and beautiful ways to walk in ruffles.

8. Ruffle high waisted shorts

Shorts are perfect for any day , any night, anwhere. And when the ruffle thing is added to them, they look freaking stylish. Lately, I’ve fallen in love with these high waisted ruffle shorts. They look super cute in any color or design. You can pair them with crop tops, tank tops, camisoles and many more. Striped ones create sophisticated look, whereas floral ones promise you the perfect boho look. You can also try the two piece sets that are available online. These ruffle shorts and matching crop top would look great for any day out.

9. Ruffle layered sheer mesh blouse

Sheer tops are very popular these days for the elegance they add to the outfit. The mesh detailing makes you look charming and adorable. When layers of sheer ruffles are mounted on a mesh blouse, nobody can stop talking about your outfit. So, don’t miss the boat!

10. One shoulder ruffle trim jumpsuit

Jumpsuits and rompers are perfect to slay any occasion. And when ruffles are added to them, they look absolutely ravishing. These one shouldered ruffle jumpsuits are nailing the fashion trends. These are super comfortable, highly fashionable and absolutely recommendable.

 

Cheers, stay bright!

fields.title: DIY hair spray for shiny and beautiful hair!
fields.body:
“I tried to kill a spider with hair spray today. He is still alive but his hair looks fabulous.” 😛

Hair spray assists brilliantly to keep the hair in place and add texture to it. Hair sprays help us try out any fun hairstyle, de-frizz the hair and add volume to the hair as well. But the hairsprays that are available in markets are chemical laden and they damage the hair badly. They are expensive too.

Instead of pouring too many bucks into buying those artificial hair sprays that aid in no way, try out these super easy, economical and natural hair sprays that can be prepared at home easily. They require not less than 10 minutes and the procedure is pretty simple. Here are the three cushy recipes. Try them out!

1. Sugar & essential oil hair spray


Ingredients :

Sugar – 1 spoon
Water – 1 glass
Essential oil – 5-6 drops

Procedure:

  • Take a glass of water, pour it into a vessel and boil it until it gets lukewarm.
    Take it off and add a spoonful of sugar to it.
  • Mix it until the sugar gets completely dissolved.
  • Add 5-6 drops of any essential oil to it.
  • Stir the whole thing well again and your hairspray is done!

This is a super easy recipe and everyone can do this as all the ingredients are available easily in any store. This recipe is so economical, quick and has zero side effects. The sugar helps open up the pores and aids hair growth naturally. If you have this serum, believe me, you’ll never step back while trying out any hairstyle!

2. Lemon hair spray


Ingredients:

Water – 1 glass
Salt – 1 tablespoon
Essential oil- 5-6 drops
Glycerine- half tablespoon

Procedure :

  • Take a glass of water, add 1 tablespoon of salt, a half tablespoon of glycerin and boil it until all the ingredients get properly mixed with water.
  • Take it off, add 5-6 drops of essential oil and stir the whole mixture and your hairspray is done!

This hairspray is perfect for any occasion. Besides keeping the hair in place, glycerin moisturizes the hair follicles from the roots. It helps in smoothening the hair and de-frizzes the hair as well. Lavender or olive oil can be preferred in this recipe. This is simple and low budget way to make your hair look amazing for any party or occasion.

3.Orange & vodka hair spray

Ingredients:

Freshly extracted orange juice/pulp – 1 cup

Water- 2 cups

Vodka ( or any suitable alcohol )- 2-3 table spoons

Lavender oil- 5-6 drops

Procedure:

  • Mix one cup of freshly extracted orange pulp and two cups of fresh water.
  • Boil the mixture on low flame until the whole mixture is well mixed and boiled.
  • Let it cool and strain the mixture through a filter cloth or sieve.
  • Add few drops of lavender oil and 2-3 spoons of vodka to the mixture and stir it well. Now the hair spray is ready to use.

This hair spray is particularly useful and effective for dark hair colour. Orange extract helps in multiplying the shine and vodka helps in thickening the hair. This hair spray aids in hair growth as well. Vodka acts as a disinfectant and prevents scalp infections which is an added bonus. Besides all, you will be amazed to see the results!

Tips and suggestions

  • Make sure the spray bottle is clean and has proper misting nozzles before transferring the liquid into the bottle.
  • Add coconut oil or coconut milk to add volume to the hair.
  • Sea salts can also be added to texturize the hair.
  • While spraying, separate the hair into sections and spray it evenly.
fields.short_description: I tried to kill a spider with hair spray today. He is still alive but his hair looks fabulous.& 😛 Hair spray assists brilliantly to keep the hair in place and add texture to it. Hair sprays help us try out any fun hairstyle, de-frizz the hair and add volume to the hair as well.

fields.title: 15 Benefits of Watermelon for Skin, Hair and Health
fields.body:
Theirs is nothing quite like eating a juicy piece of watermelon when the summer sun is scorching down on you. This juicy summer fruit is not just not only a pleasant summer snack but the health benefits the summer fruit offers are tremendous.

This juicy fruit contains a substantial amount of Vitamin C, magnesium, calcium, potassium protein, fiber and many nutritional values which are beneficial to our overall health. Let’s explore some of the health benefits Watermelon has to offer.

Watermelon and health

  1. Watermelon equals to Healthy Kidneys

Watermelon comprises of water, as the name suggests and we all know how important water is for the kidneys, this fruit acts as a diuretic (a substance helpful in the production of urine). This fruit helps regulate the kidneys smoothly.

  1. Keep your Blood Pressure low low low

Often find yourself dealing with high blood pressure? Take a slice of watermelon and calm down. Watermelon contains amino acid which further breaks down to nitric acid, responsible for lower down the blood pressure.

  1. A healthy heart

Heart health is important. Period. Watermelon is one such fruit, that add benefits to maintain the health of your heart. Lycopene present in this fruit is known to improve cardiac functions, along with the Vitamin C and potassium present are known to reduce cholesterol, according to Organic Facts.

  1. Prevents Cancer

Yes, it is possible to combat cancer with watermelon, this fruit is enriching with lycopene and Vitamin C which are responsible to maintain a steady flow of blood prevents clotting and can even destroy harmful cells from the body. Remember, this is not a magic totem, you need to follow a healthy lifestyle as well to combat diseases like cancer.

  1. Improve your vision with a slice of watermelon

This summer fruit is loaded with Vitamin A, which is essential for healthy vision. Go grab a slice of watermelon and get a healthy vision.

 

Watermelon and Skin

  1. Hydrates your skin

Watermelon contains 92% of water and organic acids that are known to improve cosmetic health. Whether you use watermelon facemask or eat a raw slice, it has amazing impact to maintain hydration of your skin.

  1. Stay young forever with a slice of watermelon

The citrulline, lycopene and other necessary vitamins present in the fruit which relaxes muscles, increase blood flow, reduce inflammation of the skin and reduce visible signs of aging. This fruit is truly a secret potion for youth.

  1. Kick that acne in the curb

Acnes are like irritating uninvited guests, there’s no escape to it. If you want to cure your acne for good, this juicy summer fruit is perfect for you. It contains Vitamin A C and nitric acid which significantly lowers down the process of acne growth. Besides watermelon reduces skin inflammation and lowers the growth of acne-causing germs.

  1. A natural skin toner

On the hunt for a good skin toner? Look no further! Vitamin C, and antioxidants present in the fruit rejuvenate skin cells and protect skin from damage. You can put fresh watermelon juice gently on your skin and rinse off to get toned skin.

  1. No more oily skin

Remember how Vitamin A present in watermelon helps reduction of acne? Watermelon also cures oily skin along, it controls the oil-producing glands known as sebaceous glands, making your face oil and acne free.

 

Watermelon and Hair

  1. Moisturise your hair with watermelon

Watermelon seeds are just as healthy and filled with health benefits as rest of the fruit. Watermelon seed oil are rich in essential fatty acid, they make your hair lustrous and moisturises your hair and since watermelon contains 92% water it revives moisture in your scalp.

  1. Minimise your hair loss

Citrulline breaks down into amino acid (arginine), an element necessary for hair growth. Citrulline present in the watermelon make sure, your scalp is getting a healthy dosage of blood flow, thus providing the necessary volume your hair needs.

  1. Prevents breakage

The seed oil of watermelon contains antioxidants and fatty acid, it promotes smooth circulation of blood flow in the scalp and gives your hair better elasticity.

  1. Longer hair

As we know by now watermelon is an amazing source of Vitamin C, it maintains the RBC (Red Blood Cell) count, provides iron to the body which is necessary for the growth of hair.

  1. Heal dry scalp

Do you have dry scalp? Just pour some watermelon juice on your scalp, its healing properties works like a charm on your dry scalp.

 

Well? Go and grab this juicy fruit for yourself and enjoy this tasty summer treat along with the health benefits.

Cheers!

fields.title: 5 different ways to style a black kurti!
fields.body:
Sometimes, we run out of outfits and find absolutely nothing to wear. What are we supposed to do then? Sit still and chill out, because this is when the black kurti comes to rescue. A black kurti is something every woman has in her wardrobe. There are numerous ways to wear a simple black kurti. Here are my five favourite, easy yet elegant ways to style a plain black kurti. Give a glance!

1.Classy denim look


The first way of styling a plain black kurti is by pairing it with a denim bottom. A plain black kurti worn in combination with a blue skin fit ankle length denim would look classy and super stylish. However, there are people who love black on black and this doesn’t disappoint them at all. Any denim would go perfect with this one. You can turn the look into indo-western by adding proper jhumkas or any Indian traditional jewelry. This outfit will serve all the purposes : lunch, brunch, family picnic, evening date and anything. It’s a perfect and simple way to slay on any occasion!

2.Pair with a coat or blazer


Kurti with a coat is perfect for festive occasions and it never goes out of style. This can be done in two ways. The first look is indo-western one : pairing a black kurti with a denim and an embellished coat. This looks supercool and pretty much celebrityish. The second one is the ethnic one: pairing with patiyala and a coat. This one is a perfect traditional way to style a black kurti. Nonetheless, both the ways look fabulous when a perfect coat is added.I personally love the ethnic blazer style coats of dim shades to pair with a black kurti. If you don’t like to pair with a coat, you can go for a cape as well. Capes are super in-trend and stylish. Sheer ones are the best to pair with a black kurti.

3. Play with different bottoms


If you aren’t an ethnic lover, this is the right option for you. You can pair a black kurti with numerous kinds of bottoms and it would look incredible on any one. Striped bottoms, culottes, palazzos, harem pants and multiple more to choose from. This is the perfect way to look trendy even while wearing a kurta. This outfit is very comfortable and perfect for all day work. The indo-western style looks absolutely edgy and flawless.

4.Black kurti with a skirt

This kind of look would be greatly impressive for you if you’re running out of outfits for a wedding or any grand occasion. It’s so much fun as well. Pick any of your favourite skirt, preferably coloured one and wear it with your straight cut black kurti. You’ll be amazed to see the way the outfit turns out. You can go all the way from any of the plain printed skirts to the embellished ones according to your style and occasion. It’s a quick, brilliant and effortless way to style a simple plain black kurti. You’ll love the swap of the look!

5. Adorable dupatta style


This is my favourite way to style out of all these five ways. For this look you need not worry about the cut of the kurti as this works for any cut ones and pleated ones as well. You just have to wear black bottom with the kurti and then comes the most fun part. Pick a contrasting dupatta of any color or design and pair with the suit. This brings the perfect ethnic style and I absolutely love it. You can pick the dupatta as abstract as possible. I personally love styling with kalamkari and banarasi silk dupattas as they uphold the ethnic vibes pluperfectly!

fields.title: 10 Benefits of Yoga in our daily life
fields.body:
“Yoga heals the soul.”

Yoga is the perfect combination of physical, mental and spiritual well-being. Continued practice gives you a sense of peace and improves the alignment of the mind, body, and spirit.  Regular practice of Yoga gives us a number of health benefits, so much that the entire world celebrates International Yoga Day on June 21st.  If you aren’t on board the yoga express yet, here are ten reasons that will make you give this a try.

1-Improves Flexibility


Don’t worry if in your first class you can barely touch your toes or even your knees, for that matter. If you are consistent, then you will definitely notice a gradual loosening and maybe you’ll even do the splits! You will notice your aches and pains go away and you will be way more flexible than you ever were.

2-Increases Blood Flow


Yoga exercises help in blood circulation which gives more oxygen to your cells. This boosts haemoglobin levels and RBCs which are important carriers of oxygen to tissues.

3-Better Posture


While practising yoga, your head needs to be balanced directly on your erect spine. This lessens the work for your neck and back muscles to support it. Especially in this day and age of cellphone addiction, we all have what doctors call the cellphone spine. Its constantly bent and the only solution is to hold up your phone in front of your face, which nobody would do it honestly. So some yoga practice will definitely reduce the daily damage we do to our spines. Plus sitting up straight makes you look slimmer and so confident.

4-Improves Bone Health


There are many yoga poses where you need to lift your own weight especially the postures like downward dog and upward dog. Exercises which make you bear your own body weight improve your bone strength and saves you a world of trouble in old age.

5-Builds Muscular Strength


Yoga builds strength and flexibility and protects your body from bone-related ailments. When you build muscle at the gym, you sometimes do it at the cost of your flexibility but while practising yoga you build both at the same time. The more muscles you have, the more your resting metabolism is and the faster you lose weight and keep burning calories while not doing anything.

6-Drains lymph and boosts immunity

While practising yoga, the different postures you need to get into and stretch your muscles and increase the drainage of lymph from your body especially around your organs which in turn boosts immunity. This will help you to fight infections, destroy diseased cells and dispose of harmful wastes.

7-Increases focus

The most important element of yoga practice is the focus. It improves coordination, reduces reaction time and improves memory. Yoga stresses on focusing on the present and be less distracted. It increases your ability to solve problems and recall information better.

8-Improves balance

Yoga improves proprioception which is the ability of your body to know what it is doing and where it is present. It really helps you to increase your balance which leads to fewer falls and injuries.

9-Increases your heart rate

If you regularly get your heart rate in the aerobic zone, you decrease the chances of heart attack and lower depression. All yoga isn’t aerobic but it still improves cardiovascular conditioning, increases endurance and maximizes intake of oxygen during exercise.

10-Makes you healthier and happier

Consistent yoga practice improved depression and led to a significant increase in serotonin levels and a decrease in the levels of monoamine oxidase and cortisol.
A regular practice gets you moving and burns calories and the spiritual and emotional dimensions of your practice may encourage you to address any eating and weight problems on a deeper level. Yoga may also inspire you to become a more conscious eater.

We hope that now you are interested in yoga and if you need some beginner’s motivation, check out Yoga with Adrienne on YouTube. Good luck!

fields.title: 7 Sassy and Amazing Ways to Style the Bodysuits
fields.body:
Bodysuits are one of the newest trends which are spotted everywhere. We have seen the celebrities wearing this trend, the bloggers nailing this trend and now everyone is trying their hands on this super chic fashion staple. We were quite neutral about this fashion pick initially but now as we have figured out some amazing ways to style it, I think we are totally ready to make some statement with the body suits. If you are also looking for some ways in how to style this chic fashion staple, then get glued to this blog post and by the end, you will be having 7 amazing ways to style the bodysuits.

1. Layering Game Strong

Bodysuits are better than the bikinis for the pool time and beach time. But when you are out of the pool and are wanting to make some statement with the bodysuits, you can layer it with a maxi shrug or bohemian midi skirt. This adds a fun element to your simple outfit and you look stylish instantly.

Source

2. Black High Waisted Pants for Daily Look

Black high waisted pants are one of the most important outfits in our wardrobe. You can style your body suits with the black high waisted pants. This looks uber chic and styling it is really very simple. Just pairing two simple outfits can make a fabulous statement for the party wear as well as casual looks.

Source

3. Cool Look with the Pinafore Shorts/Skirts

Pinafore shorts and the skirts are ultra cute outfits which you can style in various ways. But, you need to be comfortable in these outfits and for this, you will have to wear something underneath which gets tucked in properly. This definitely makes one of the best ways to style the body suits and stay super comfortable all day long.

Source

4. Ripped Denim for the Rouge Look

One of the best ways to style the bodysuits is by pairing it with the ripped denim pants. This makes you look chic and your curves are well defined in this ensemble. You can also style and pair a denim shirt or a denim jacket with this to create a chic denim and denim look.

Source

5. Underneath the Slip Dresses

I am sure you have tried wearing halter neck tops, turtleneck tops, off shoulder tops and crop tops with the slip dresses. But have you tried wearing the slip dresses with the body suits? Trust me it is going to look sexy to the core and you will stay perfectly comfortable in this ensemble. You can try this look for the brunch, parties, semi-formal look and much more.

Source

6. Pant Suits for the Formal Look

One of the finest ways to style the bodysuits is with the pantsuits. Pantsuits are formal and they demand sheer sexiness. You have to be totally and completely in proper style while wearing this outfit. The bodysuits will get tucked in easily and will not be a mess making you look ultra comfortable and confident.

Source

7. Styling it with the Dungarees

Another one of the coolest ways to style the bodysuits is with dungarees. Just like the pinafore shorts, it will look awesome with the dungarees as well. It seamlessly fits inside the dungarees and makes you look stylish to the core.

Source

These were some of the best ways to style the bodysuits in seven different styles. Now, that you know you can style the bodysuits in seven different ways, your investment in the bodysuits is not going to go in vain. Choose from the wide range and styles of bodysuits and style them in different ways.

fields.title: 5 Jewellery designers you should look upon for perfect accessorization for your look!
fields.body:
Hello, fashionistas,

Seems like you’re all set for the day’s outing. Is there something missing? Does it feel that maybe one pair of earring or a ring could take your outfit to another level of appeal? Or maybe it’s a scarf, or a ring, or a bracelet, or a necklace? Well, you’re not wrong.


Jewels, in all form, have always been an essential part of our culture(s) since ancient times. It is not just for the adoration of one’s beauty; it serves different purposes that are significant to us. In the contemporary society, jewelry and accessories are the new fashion statement which enhances the façade.


It is not limited to the women in today’s time; men wear jewelry too! Be it a ring, band, ear stud, or a bracelet to give an edge to their look and personality. If we trace the history back to a few decades ago, the only two prominent metals used to forge pretty jewels such as necklaces, armbands, waist-bands, rings, earrings, nose rings, headbands, and anklets were gold and silver. But today, other materials have taken an equally prominent importance in the industry of ornaments such as platinum, diamond, ruby, emerald, pearl, and other colored stones are used to make attractive jewels.

I mean, can you imagine your best friend’s wedding without those matching earrings? No, right!?
Why only jewelry!? If you want to be called a fashionable girl, then all the fashion accessories, including jewelry, are very important for you. A Manish wardrobe is not the definition of fashion nowadays, it’s not nearly enough.

To have your look completed, you need to equip yourself with the suitable accessory. Heels? Bags? Ornaments? Hairpins? Hairbands? You need that, babe! Unless you want to feel vacant and empty and something’s is missing and OH! MY GOD, WHY WOULD YOU EVEN WANT THAT! To keep up with the latest fashion, accessories are very important; the absence makes you feel incomplete while dressing up!

Like I discussed before, jewelry is an essential part of the fashion statement. The type, design, material, and style vary for both the genders and all the age groups. Children and teens like plastic and glass jewelry ornaments because they prefer having colorful jewels. Unlike us, who are always trying to match the stones with the color of the belt and the shoes.


Women are observed to prefer diamond rings, diamond bracelets, charms and necklaces for special occasions such as an engagement and for a wedding, precious stones jewelry. Men, on the other hand, wear large pendants and large rings with a cross or any other symbolic sign which are rather minimal in nature. Silver chains and bracelets are also best for men. (Sallu Bhaaaiii!)

Necklaces around the collarbone look very appealing and attractive. It can go from being a minimal choker to an ethnic band that covers the entire nape. In the daytime, long necklaces look better while at night, shorter ones or pendants steal the show. Again, men are known to wear chains that are usually made up of metals like gold, silver, platinum or steel with a cross or a religious sign. I’m not stereotyping because I personally love the skull jewelry.
Accessories such as bags or shoes or watches or hairbands or eyewear, everything has a statement to make and what you wear is equally important as when you wear it. Here are a few designers who have been stealing the show in Delhi by making mesmerizing jewelry.

1-Amrita Singh

A top jewelry designer, her globally adored designs are a blend of ancient aesthetics with new world fashion. She has been nominated by Fashion Group International (FGI) many times.
Her inspiration comes from the Mughal dynasty to fabricate Indian jewelry and accessories. Additionally, this lady also designs scarves, bangle towers, cosmetics cases, handbags along with a wide range of home decor items.

2-Poonam Soni

She was the first person to initiate the idea of ‘bespoke jewelry’ and signature boutiques. In today’s time, she is one of the most renowned names in the designing industry and her jewelry brand has a niche clientage which she caters to. The way she plays with rubies, gold and sapphires are mesmerizing.

3-Farah Khan

After she is done being one of the best people to play around with jewelry designing ideas, she’s a gemologist for her passion. Her foray into the field of designing occurred by chance while she was on her venture to pursue the course in Gemological Institute of America in California in 1992. She has been sweeping the fashionistas off their feet for the past 15 years and her works have been seen on some of the richest and known people across the globe.

4-Suhani Pittie

Often known for being one of the ‘top 10 most inventive and ingenious jewelry designers in the world’ by the ‘World Gold Council’, she has also been conscripted by the Femina magazine in their “35 most powerful women in India, under 35″ list.

5-Eina Ahluwalia

Synonymous with luxurious jewels. Each piece that she makes is an elaborate, decorative and an avid piece studded with pure silver and sometimes, semi-precious stones.

“Her label is a regular lookout at Lakme Fashion Week, Mumbai. It has been featured in many known fashion magazines such as Vogue, British Vogue, Her World Singapore, CR Fashion Book by Carine Roitfeld, Magazine UK, InStyle, Cosmopolitan, Madame Figaro France, Stylist, Zeit Magazine Germany, Marie Claire, Harper’s Bazaar, Elle, Grazia, etc.” (Source: www.fashionlady.in)

So, ladies, go ahead. Dress up, match those accessories and slay!

fields.title: 5 Best lookbooks for plus size beauties!
fields.body:
“Beauty comes in all sizes.”

Every girl in town would love to have a fashion handbook of dress-for-your-shape advice. However, a majority of these guidebooks ignore the plus-size women. Despite creeping into a major share of the plus-size purchasing market, the full-figured women have always been excluded from the fashion colloquy.

Who wouldn’t love a closet full of figure-flattering clothes that play her assets? “Figure-flattering” might not seem like a big deal for some you out there, but for those women who are size 14 and upwards; it has remained a pipe dream! Their desires for a body-embracing ensemble have always gone for a toss that most of them are absolutely clueless about finding the perfect shopping store that fits their sizing needs. And even if they manage to find one, most of them end up burning hole in their pockets.

So, aren’t there any shops favoring the full-figured ladies? Is our fashion choices very much limited compared to the rest of the world? Well, not at all! Now, unlike the ladies that fall below the size 14 fittings, each of the curvy women are different from one another.

Some of you might have a pear-shaped body while another fragment might have the shape of an hourglass. But the unanimous fashion commandment for every full-figured woman is to pick the attire that softens your curves and gives minimal definitions to the lesser loved areas of your body. Here is a lookbook dedicated just for your elegant curves!

1-EMPIRE

Flowy empire waist dress

 

Empire waistline shirt gown

The “Empire Waist” is a classic wardrobe staple of every full-figured woman. The dress gives a high-waist appearance that gathers just beneath the busts and not your natural waistline. This plays up your graceful upper body since the lower body is usually engulfed by a layered skirt. From the shorter tunics and mini dresses to the longer gowns that grace the floor, the empire silhouettes come in a myriad of variations – giving you an opportunity to pick for the occasion rather than for the size. Now, if you are whisking of the empire gown as something western, then you’ve always got the aesthetic anarkalis.

2-A-LINE

A-line dress

Ruffled A-line

An A-line had been in the fashion line up since time immemorial. But the A-lines of the curvy-women have a slight variation from the usual. Rather than opting for the body-clinging materials of satin and silk, the full-figured beauty can go for stiffer fabrics like cotton, denim and the like. Opting for stiffer A-lines helps you retain the shape of the dress by flattering your curves. The A-line silhouettes with a fitted torso and beautifully wrapped waist-line, despite hugging onto your body, will give you an hourglass figure that portrays the gorgeous side of you that even you haven’t noticed in these years!

3-PEPLUM

Cold-shoulder peplum top

Peplum is most probably the only attire that is not solely dedicated for the string beans but also for the full-figured ladies! Do you remember noticing tunic-like dresses that have got a slight ruffle around the waistline? Those are the peplum, pretty similar to the classic bodycon dresses. But the slight layer of ruffle around the natural waistline covers up the curves in a graceful way, making your waist smaller than the upper body-creating the iconic hourglass figure! So if you’ve got a disproportionate distribution of curves than the peplum would help you synchronize your waist with the rest of the body.

4-STRAIGHT

Straight black dress

These dresses add minimal definitions to your body. They simply fall flat from your shoulders and would work wonders on your body image if your shoulders and the waists are of the same width or slightly wider than one another. They contribute to effortless fashion and are impressively charming when adorned with statement pieces of jewelry.

5-COLD-SHOULDER

Off-shoulder ruffled dress

 

Cold-shoulder tunic

The off-the-shoulder dresses simply wrap up your arms leaving a bare shoulder. Such fabrics enhance your décolletage and pull weight off your upper body. So, if your shoulders are narrower than your waistline, these heavy fabrics holding your arm might help add some volume. The cold-shoulder of today are not are not mere tunic tops. They’ve gradually infringed into the India Kurtis and the more ruffled outfits to create a statement of their own!

6-CORSET

Gothic ruffled lace corset dress

 

Lace up plus-size corset

They are aesthetic fashion pieces that specifically designed to define your assets, clinches your waistline and loosens put at the hips. The laced details of the corset gracefully shape your body and flatter your curves.

fields.name: Sennheiser - Momentum In-Ear
fields.description:
The Sennheiser Momentum In-ear earphones is the newest addition in the highly-acclaimed and well-received Momentum series from the house of Sennheiser. Designed in an iconic black and red finish. Even the chord is dual colored to distinguish between the left and right sides these earphones are not only great lookers, but their small stainless steel sound tunnel also impart great sound to these earphones. Hence, leaving no stones unturned. They come with an inline three button remote control and microphone that let you control your calls and music from just the cord. The cord too is slightly thick and elliptical, and hence refuses to tangle. The package comes included with an extremely stylish carry case that is artfully created. The Sennheiser Momentum In-ear is an offering that is too good to let go off.

fields.name: Sony - MDR-XB550AP
fields.description:
Sony is the go-to brand for people who love their bass. An upgrade from the older the XB450AP, the brand now brings the Sony-MDR-XB550AP with an improvement to the already classic metallic finish and amazing features. Promising you the best of comfort, the headphones come with thickly padded earcups that act as a soft cushioning to your ears. The flexible body, where the swivelling earcups fold flat, lets you easily adjust the headphones on your ears. Furthermore, the slim, build makes it perfect for easy storage in a bag, briefcase or backpack. The XB550AP comes with a flat serrated cord for a tangle-free experience. Backed by an in-line single-button remote and microphone, you can easily answer calls and adjust the music volume to your liking. 

Powered by Extra Bass technology these over-ears let you experience richly and crisp punchy audio. Choose from 3 vivid colours all with a metallic finish and flaunt your style everywhere you go.

fields.name: Harman Kardon - Soho Wireless
fields.description: The Soho Wireless is a premium offering from audio major, Harman Kardon. At first glance, luxury is the thing that comes to mind when you see these beauties. The swipe control sensors say goodbye to unsightly buttons while retaining functionality. Bluetooth and NFC ensure that you are always connected. The Soho Wireless not only looks great but also sounds great. The 30mm drivers and Neo-transducers let you listen to high-quality audio across frequencies. AAC and aptX technologies add to the quality of sound giving you music that is refined and sounds great!

fields.name: Skullcandy - Crusher Wireless
fields.description:
Skullcandy, the super cool brand has won accolades and continues to be popular among music enthusiasts who love tonnes of bass. The Skullcandy Crusher is a favourite for its skull-crushing bass and now welcomes an upgrade in the form of the all new Skullcandy Crusher Wireless.  

The Skullcandy Crusher Wireless has been designed to let you experience the difference. One of the premium headphones in the market, these unique headphones gain their juice from a rechargeable battery and ditch the 3.5mm jack for Bluetooth connectivity. 

If you are a sucker for bass, the Skullcandy Crusher Wireless is a treat to your ears. The headphones employ adjustable Haptics - an active bass boost amplifier with an adjustable bass controller built into the ear cups. You can literally get the headphones to pound out bass, depending on your mood and playlist.

fields.description:
The Sony - MDR-XB650BT combine punchy, extra bass sound with long listening comfort and the ability to stream your music with no wires, seamlessly.  Covering sounds across a wide frequency spectrum and is designed for today’s bass-heavy music, picking up every possible bass note. 

Built with a mix of durable plastic and metal, we love its contemporary design. The wireless over-ear headset provides up to a 30 ft. or 10m wireless range and playback time of upto 30 hrs. The headphones come with NFC one touch device coupling for further streaming options. An integrated microphone make these functional with smartphones whether you are streaming audio or taking calls. Swiveling ear pads allow for easy transportation. Thus, you can conveniently carry them wherever you go.

The XB650BT is a perfectly comfortable pair that excels at delivering some very intense bass.

fields.description:
The glitter of dew drops glistening in the morning sun are proof Mother Nature is a bit of a fashionista and loves her bling. As do we. Particularly if gold happens to be involved.

EDITOR’S TIP: When you’re just not sure what jewelry you want to wear, trying slipping this easy but eyecatching piece on. Looks especially chic with warmer hues like ivory, turquoise, tangerine, hot pink and an Armani’ish taupe.
Handcrafted with mirror and gold plated brass.

Chain measures 80 cm in length.

fields.name: JBL - E65BTNC
fields.description: The E65BTNC comes from JBL, a renowned brand in the music industry. With Active Noise Cancellation, you can say goodbye to outside noise and enjoy JBL’s signature sound to the fullest. The battery life of 24 hours (when Active Noise Cancellation is off) adds to this headphone’s features. Last but not the least, the E65BTNC is extremely comfortable with its angled, form-fitting cushions and soft fabric headband.

fields.name: Focal - Spark Wireless
fields.description:
Live in extreme comfort with the Focal Spark Wireless brought to you in Silver and Black. The 3-button remote helps you to control your music while the microphone ensures extremely clear calls. It comes with Bluetooth 4.1 version and compatible with aptX.

Also, flaunt your style with the flat tangle-free (around-the-neck) cable and enjoy the pleasures of pure audio with the 8-hour battery life. Listen to detailed sound with convenience and no worries through these awesome in-ears.

fields.name: Plantronics - BackBeat PRO 2
fields.description:
Plantronics has been around since the dawn of the wireless communication age and has proven their expertise in the Apollo Space Program. If you are looking for a comfortable headset packed with super smart features then this well-crafted piece will surely impress you on various levels.

From sound to silence and back the BackBeat PRO 2 does it all withon-demand active noise cancelling creates an oasis of personal space in a public place with one touch. Immerse yourself in exceptional audio with Plantronic’s signature sound with  the richness and definition in high notes, crisp sound, mid-tones sound natural, and deep powerful bass delivers low notes with minimum distortion.

fields.name: Sennheiser - HD 4.40 BT
fields.description:
A headphone meant for listening to pure and mature sound on the move, the Sennheiser HD 4.40 BT is a wireless Bluetooth headphone that keeps your music along with you. With Bluetooth 4.0 and aptX codec support, enjoy wireless high-quality audio. With a sound signature that is clear and has dynamically powerful bass, Sennheiser keeps your spirits lively with these headphones. A durable closed-back headphone made from tough materials and elegant design, it looks as good as it sounds. Control your music and your calls with the intuitive controls on the earcups. Speak clearly and sound better with the omnidirectional microphone.

In short, the Sennheiser HD 4.40 BT is a wireless headphone with superior audio quality, elegant looks, and features that dazzle you in the same way it sounds.

fields.name: GRAZIA CONTEMPORARY TEXTURED LOAFER
Skullcandy - Ink’d Wireless
fields.description: Based on the very popular wired Ink’d earbuds, the Skullcandy’s Ink’d Wireless are the all new wireless headsets that feature a Bluetooth enabled design. Its powerful sculpted audio produces dynamic sound with clean heavy bass. The noise isolating fit enhances rich clear audio of Supreme Sound. Now you can listen to music from all genres, while experiencing it in its true essence. Engineered to be extremely lightweight, its flex collar lets you easily stow them into them your bag when on the move. Bluetooth convenience lets you go cord free with ease. Designed to make you feel comfortable, the headphones feature a neck band cable that loops the cable from ear to ear. These headsets come with an in-line remote and mic. You can control your music and answer your calls by merely using the remote. The Bluetooth feature enabled with the in-line mic gives you a complete hands free experience.

fields.name: Baroque Pearl Long Necklace
fields.description:
Cubic zirconias add up to some serious hardcore shine, while Baroque pearl lends a softer, organic touch. Luxury but laid back. Glam yet approachable. A paradox of the most chic kind.

EDITOR’S TIP: For born-rich elegance, wear with a silk blouse during the day or something sleeveless, sexy and drapey in the evening.
Handcrafted with cz, baroque pearl, and 18k gold plated brass.

Each pearl measures 2 cm long and 1.5 cm across.

fields.name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Solo 3 Wireless
fields.description:
When it comes to music and comfort, Beats stands up right there. The award winning premium beats sound has every Beats lover’s heart. With the Class 1 Bluetooth, Beats have remastered wireless sound, making it perfect for everyday headphone. No clumsy wires around to annoy you, bettering the music experience. The Solo3 Wireless gives you upto 40 hours of battery life with the innovative fast fuel feature that instantly charges. Its an all day play headphone! These headphones are very portable with its sleek and alluring design. You can take them every where, easily foldable, durable and portable.

These headphones are ready to go when you are!

These on-ear headphones have adjustable cushioned ear cups which lets you customize your fit. The Beats Solo 3 Wireless are only compatible with iOS devices. Plug.Play.Go.

fields.name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Studio 3 Wireless
fields.description:
The newly launched Beats by Dr. Dre Studio 3 Wireless has Pure Noise Cancelling Technology which actively pinpoints and blocks outside noise for you to just immerse in your music.

It is backed with a 22 hours battery life and you can extend its battery life by upto 40 hours just by switching off the ANC. The Fast Fuel technology can turn 10 minutes of charging into 3 hours of playback even when the battery is low. The Studio 3 Wireless features a W1 chip to maximize your listening experience. The Class 1 Bluetooth provides wider range with fewer drop-outs. Seamlessly switch from taking calls to watching movies on your Macbook with its Multi-Point technology.

fields.name: Sony - MDR-XB950B1
fields.description:
Sony is an extremely popular brand and is especially a favourite among people who love that extra dollop of bass to your music palate. Not ceasing to surprise, a much-awaited successor to the Sony - MDR-XB950BT, the Sony - MDR-XB950B1 packs along a bunch of new features and an improved design that is worthy to lay your hands on. The added bass emphasis to every beat is credited to the Electronic Bass Boost circuitary. With a noted improvement of Bluetooth Wireless Connectivity, no more do you have to bear with tangling and annoying wires.  Stream with no wires, and seamlessly with AAC and apt-X® support.(not in case of passive operation).

The Sony MDR-XB950B1 comes with the Headphone Connect App, letting you tune your music the way you love. The new wireless over-ear headset provides up to 18 hours and playback time, after 4 hours of charge. An integrated microphone make these functional with smartphones whether you are streaming audio or taking calls. Swivelling ear pads allow for easy portability.

fields.name: Jabra - Elite Sport
fields.description:
The Jabra Elite Sport is the most technically advanced true wireless sports earbuds, made for the unstoppable fitness buff who refuses to settle for less. Meet your true match in the Jabra Elite Sport.

Thanks to the Jabra Sport Life app you can get a personalized audio trainer and fitness coach to add value to your workouts. Tune into music without worries with 4.5 hours of playback time on a single charge. The Jabra charging case adds 9 more hours to your battery backup yielding a total of 13.5 hours battery life. Experience great sound with bass enriched yet balanced earphones. Get superior quality calls with 4 microphones that hear you speak and suppress background noise. With free bundled Comply ear tips and a host of ear fins, Jabra ensures a secure and comfortable fit. Choose between experiencing isolation or hear the world around using Hear Through technology.

The Jabra Elite Sport is here to knock your socks off with excellent sound, featureful fitness technologies and an all-day battery life.

fields.description:
Plantronics has been around since the dawn of the wireless communication age and have proven their expertise in the Apollo Space Program, the one where the first man walked on the moon. If you are looking for a comfortable headset packed with super smart features then this well-crafted piece will surely impress you on various levels.

We, at Headphone Zone, love the Plantronics BackBeat FIT for its sweat-proof behind-the-neck earbud design. The FIT is ideal for the workout enthusiast and with safety-oriented features such as reflective finishes on the back as well as controls on the earpieces, it is a great buy. We love the sporty colour options as well: choose from Electric Blue & Lime Burst.

fields.name: Sony - MDR-XB950B1
fields.description:
Sony is an extremely popular brand and is especially a favourite among people who love that extra dollop of bass to your music palate. Not ceasing to surprise, a much-awaited successor to the Sony - MDR-XB950BT, the Sony - MDR-XB950B1 packs along a bunch of new features and an improved design that is worthy to lay your hands on. The added bass emphasis to every beat is credited to the Electronic Bass Boost circuitary. With a noted improvement of Bluetooth Wireless Connectivity, no more do you have to bear with tangling and annoying wires.  Stream with no wires, and seamlessly with AAC and apt-X® support.(not in case of passive operation).

The Sony MDR-XB950B1 comes with the Headphone Connect App, letting you tune your music the way you love. The new wireless over-ear headset provides up to 18 hours and playback time, after 4 hours of charge. An integrated microphone make these functional with smartphones whether you are streaming audio or taking calls. Swivelling ear pads allow for easy portability.

fields.name: Skullcandy - Method BT
fields.description:
Skullcandy, the true-blooded American brand produces headphones that are vastly imploring to young adults. Not straying too far from this idea, the brand brings to us the all new Skullcandy Method BT. These wireless in-ears reproduce your music with a nice tonal balance, consisting of stupefying powerful bass, nice warm and natural vocals and highs that are precise and clear sounding.

Featuring Bluetooth convenience, the BT lets you work out even far away from your phone. The collar style design further aids in giving you a secure fit. The Method Wireless In-Ears are in a league of its own. The shape of the bud has been completely redesigned for a secure snug fit. With a sweat resistant build, the Method BT felicitates long sweaty workouts as well. While the efficient and powerful battery, let your headsets running for up to 9 hours.

fields.name: SoundMAGIC - E10C
fields.description:
For the last 6 years, the SoundMAGIC - E10S has successfully achieved in providing awesome bass and captivating treble at a very affordable price. It has won innumerable awards and has become a musical delight for the audiophiles. Now, the E10C retains the performance of the previous E10S model and adds a three-button mic and remote compatible with all smartphones except the NEXUS, allowing the listener to adjust volume, skip tracks, start and stop their music and answer phone calls on the go.

Balanced bass with detailed music experience and a more realistic soundstage with natural vocals. Highly notable is its enhanced bass output, it extends deep with enhanced punch and impact thereby giving you a power package experience.

PS: The SoundMAGIC E10C, unfortunately, does not work with the Nexus Phones.

fields.name: Plantronics - Backbeat 505
fields.description: Say no to wires with Plantronics Backbeat 505. Enjoy deep, enhanced and rich sound quality for 18 hours of music and talk time with one single charge. You can listen to music all day long without being uncomfortable as these headphones are lightweight and have memory foam ear cups which gives you a perfect fit along with sound isolation. You can play, pause, skip and talk all of these with just a touch on the ear cup. Plantronics Backbeat 505 has Wireband-enabled mic which gives you control to command Siri, Google and Cortana or talk.

Perfect! Now you can get the JAYS headset control app and set controls for your remote. 

The a-JAYS series is a very carefully innovated one with product features that make it a well sought after range. An important feature is that these are the best balanced earphones - good bass, but not compromising on the treble: which results in sound that is clean and not raspy. These simple and stylish looking earphones give a surprisingly solid audio performance for the price with no distortion.

fields.name: Sony - MDR-XB650BT
fields.description:
The Sony - MDR-XB650BT combine punchy, extra bass sound with long listening comfort and the ability to stream your music with no wires, seamlessly.  Covering sounds across a wide frequency spectrum and is designed for today’s bass-heavy music, picking up every possible bass note. 

Built with a mix of durable plastic and metal, we love its contemporary design. The wireless over-ear headset provides up to a 30 ft. or 10m wireless range and playback time of upto 30 hrs. The headphones come with NFC one touch device coupling for further streaming options. An integrated microphone make these functional with smartphones whether you are streaming audio or taking calls. Swiveling ear pads allow for easy transportation. Thus, you can conveniently carry them wherever you go.

The XB650BT is a perfectly comfortable pair that excels at delivering some very intense bass.

fields.name: Ultrasone - GO
fields.description:
Ultrasone GO is the first bluetooth headphones from Ultrasone. The GO headphones are basic but beautiful when it comes to design and sound technology.

These headphones are the vanilla ice cream of headphones. The Ultrasone GO headphones use the same technologies as the Performance series headphones known as the S-Logic Plus sound technology. This technology enables you to experience music around your head like a 3D effect. This technology lets you experience the magic of music in a room full of speakers but with thesnuggly cushion like ear cups on your ears.

Trust Ultrasone to create a party in your brain.
